Special Powers
ALL THAT YOU HAVE MADE, I WILL UNMAKE: Terrain markers and objects cannot be generated into squares within 6 squares of Griever.

November 9, 2021
machineman
I like this starting line for a Dark Beast “experiment” on my sideline.
February 26, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
I'm all for multiple starting lines on characters, but I'm not sure why this dial exists/who it's for. It's incredibly potent but it fails to portray the character in an accurate way, it portrays a character that nobody cares about outside of the 5 of us who read Slotts run, and although definitely a 5/5 piece that is hyper-point efficient, it lacks the gamebreaking abilities/cohesion with other dials that would make it see play in the meta. Once sealed events are over, I imagine that this starting line will be used only if it ends up somehow fitting on a game breaking, meta team. Otherwise it will simply waste space on shelves and ebay as its cost goes down and it is entirely forgotten about
